definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
hammer/to hammer into shape/weight (e.g. of a steelyard or balance)/to strike with a hammer

sentences.english: Research of air hammer's structure and working principle.
sentences.chinese: 空氣錘結構及工作原理研究。

sentences.english: Normal hammers slam into rock 30 to 60 times per second.
sentences.chinese: 普通的氣錘每秒衝擊岩石30至60次。

sentences.english: Put the ball into the right area and Gibson's right foot is a hammer.
sentences.chinese: 你只要把球傳到禁區右側，吉布森簡直就像個氣錘。

sentences.english: Literature research of air hammer drilling in domestic and overseas.
sentences.chinese: 國內外空氣錘鑽井技術的文獻調研。

sentences.english: The brief introduction involves the operational performances of the pneumatic hammer before and after modification of the anvil-die connection.
sentences.chinese: 簡介了空氣錘錘砧錘模聯接方式改進前後的使用狀況。
